episode21.name: 21   Missouri Game, Basketball, and Bowl Speculation.
episode21.description: Arkansas loses another 4th quarter lead to end regular season. We discuss Arkansas' bowl options as well as touch on Hog Basketball's 5-0 start.
episode21.summary: On this week's edition of The Hogcast, the gang breaks down the loss  to Missouri last Friday afternoon. What went wrong? Why was Brandon  Allen playing? Why did the Hogs abandon the run? What is the SEC so  intent on making this a rivalry? The guys try to answer all of those  questions in gritty, glorious detail. After the Mizzou breakdown,  it's time to talk about the streaking 6-0 Hog hoops team, fresh off  of a nice home win against Iona. The show wraps with bowl talk and  even bowl predictions.
